page.title: 12Luxury Survey.
page.content:
We decided to carry out a survey to see how common the following items were in our area in 1985. The survey referes to families and the total number of children questioned was 374.
{ TOTAL PERCENT { _____ _______ {1.}Home computer 115 31% {2.}Micro-wave oven 39 10% {3.}Video-tape recorder 209 56% {4.}2nd colour T.V. 134 36% {5.}Hi-Fi system 285 76% {6.}Automatic Dishwasher 20 05% {7.}Tumble Dryer 39 10% {8.}2nd family car 59 16%
Percentages have been rounded to the nearest whole number.
{Hurst Knoll School.
